code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import alertContext from'../../context/alert/alertContext';var Alerts=function Alerts(){var context=useContext(alertContext);return context.alerts.length!==0&&context.alerts.map(function(alert){return React.createElement("div",{key:alert.id,className:"alert alert-".concat(alert.type)},React.createElement("i",{className:"fas fa-info-circle"})," ",alert.msg);});};export default Alerts;
